name: This Will Be My Cycle
description:
Created by myself for Ludum Dare 47 in just under 72 hours!

This Will Be My Cycle is a platformer where you must navigate a loop you build yourself! As you loop and loop, harder obstacles will start to appear.

Some rooms are easier when placed on the side, or harder next to some other rooms. Choose your placement carefully!

Legends tell that the untouched reap great rewards. How many cycles can you go without taking damage?

// Escape doesn't work in fullscreen, use P to pause!!! //
